title: #38 A Vanderpump Rules Reunion Recap with Scott Evans + A Surprise (Iconic) Bravo-lebrity Guest
itunes:title: #38 A Vanderpump Rules Reunion Recap with Scott Evans + A Surprise (Iconic) Bravo-lebrity Guest
itunes:subtitle: Danny talks Southern Charm, iconic Cher entertainment, and an accidental Bethenny Ever After binge. Scott Evans (Grace & Frankie) also joins to recap part 2 of the Vanderpump Rules reunion. PLUS, a surprise Bravo-lebrity calls in.*For bonus episod...
description:
Danny talks Southern Charm, iconic Cher entertainment, and an accidental Bethenny Ever After binge. Scott Evans (Grace & Frankie) also joins to recap part 2 of the Vanderpump Rules reunion. PLUS, a surprise Bravo-lebrity calls in.

*For bonus episodes, join the Patreon at www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic Web: www.EverythingIconic.com Twitter: www.Twitter.com/DannyPellegrino Facebook: www.Facebook.com/PellegrinoDanny Instagram: www.Instagram.com/DannyPellegrino


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
